chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
from: nid
to: nat
from': nat
s: UMC.sort (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))
i: Ordered.sort mid
m: TaggedMessage

Goal:
find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from'; to := to; active := true |} -> valid s -> no_msg_from from s -> no_msg_from from (consume_msg s i)

Premises:
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
Notation UMC T m := (UMC T m)
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
union_mapUMC : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T), mixin_of (
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
no_msg_from = fun (from : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (to : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
no_msg_from_post : forall (from from' to : nid) (s : soup) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> no_msg_from from s -> from' != from -> no_msg_from from (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to; active := true |}).1
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
no_msg_to = fun (to : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
is_active = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
is_consumed = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ ~~ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
axioms.dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [from : nid from' : nat to : nat s : union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage) i : mid m : TaggedMessage |- Type]
find_consume : forall (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (id : mid) (m : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find id s' = Some m -> find id (consume_msg s' id) = Some (mark_msg m)
umpleq_some : forall (K : ordType) (A : Type) (U : union_map_class K A) (x1 x2 : U) (t : K) (s : A), valid x2 -> [pcm x1 <= x2] -> find t x1 = Some s -> find t x2 = Some s
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
seq_last_in : forall (A : eqType) (s : seq A) (x : A), last x s \notin s -> s = [::]
consume_valid : forall (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (m : mid), valid s' -> valid (consume_msg s' m)
msg_spec = fun (from to : nid) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) => msg_in_soup from to (fun (x : nat) (y : seq nat) => (x == tg) && (y == cnt)) : nid -> nid -> nat_eqType -> seq_eqType nat_eqType -> soup -> Prop
fnd_supp : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (k : K) (s : finMap K V), k \notin supp s -> fnd k s = None
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : predType T) => let '{| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> mem_pred T) in fun A : {| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem [eta toP A] : forall (T : Type) (pT : predType T), pT -> mem_pred T Arguments mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Arguments last {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (axioms.dynamic id)
post_fresh : forall (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage), (post_msg s m).2 \notin dom s
valid_mt_soup = (fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)))) is_true_true : valid (dsoup empty_dstatelet)
soup = union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) : Type
fnd = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (k : K) (s : finMap K V) => match [seq x <- seq_of s | predk V k x] with | [::] => None | (_, v) :: _ => Some v end : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), K -> finMap K V -> option V Arguments fnd {K} {V}%type_scope
Variant dom_find_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) : bool -> Type := dom_find_none' : find k f = None -> dom_find_spec k f false | dom_find_some' : forall v : V, find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true Arguments dom_find_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments dom_find_none' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f] Arguments dom_find_some' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f v]
Inductive reflect (P : Prop) : bool -> Set := ReflectT : P -> reflect P true | ReflectF : ~ P -> reflect P false Arguments Bool.reflect _%type_scope _%bool_scope Arguments Bool.ReflectT _%type_scope Arguments Bool.ReflectF _%type_scope
